virtual_table_layer.name: sales_virtual_table
virtual_table_layer.description: Virtual table layer for sales data

fields.name: order_date
fields.description: Date when the order was placed

virtual_table_layer.name: inventory_virtual_table
virtual_table_layer.description: Virtual table layer for inventory data

virtual_tables.name: product_stock_levels
virtual_tables.query: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, sl.warehouse_id, sl.stock_quantity FROM inventory.products p JOIN inventory.stock_levels sl ON p.product_id = sl.product_id

fields.name: stock_quantity
fields.description: Quantity of stock in the warehouse

virtual_tables.name: stock_by_category
virtual_tables.description: Stock levels aggregated by product category
virtual_tables.query: SELECT c.category_name, SUM(sl.stock_quantity) AS total_stock FROM inventory.products p JOIN inventory.categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN inventory.stock_levels sl ON p.product_id = sl.product_id GROUP BY c.category_name

fields.name: total_stock
fields.description: Total stock quantity for the category
